welcome_message_body: Welcome to Honow, Germany! Known for its charming architecture and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy our beautiful city. We hope your stay here will be filled with wonderful memories and experiences.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Secondary terminal for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
